Hydras:

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 2010 11:10 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
> Hdyras followed Crytek, but he was ready for everything

Cryotek leads Hydras down a long hall escorted by two of the identicle
looking female drones that had been in the main room. The hall is
quiet, lights bink at various points indicating various states of
rediness around the base. There are doors at certain points, each of
them, judging by the red light on each one, is securely locked, barred
against intrusion.

At the end of the hall is a rather stout looking door. This door looks
as if it could stand up against the dinobots, at least for a few
minutes. A bluish purple light scans over Cryotek, and after a moment
of contemplation the door slides open allowing Cryotek and Hydras,
along with thier escort to enter into the room.

"Here." Cryotek said in grand tones. "Here is where I house the
protoforms." Cryotek gestures at two 'tanks' each of which hold a
single protoform. The first one is fairly standard, no iff signature
to speak of. The second one is strangely different. While it has the
general shape of a protoform it is black in color and it has a
definite temporal signature to it - similar to the one that Hydras may
remember came from Legacy.

OOC: Hydras might be aware of Legacy from when they all battled the
minons at the Ark, or from when Legacy helped rescue the Rodimus and
Tuscon from the black tower. It's up to you Airly if Hydras will
remember this or not.

(TAG)


Preston
